lines.text: Sexually, you're like a wild animal... whom no living man can equal.
Castle of Unrelenting Terror? I thought Cahuanga was a stupid name.
I'm beginning to think that a woman isn't a real woman unless she makes you want to smack her in the chops. Not doing it makes you a real man.
This will make the food taste better?
No, but it will make you care much less.
If this is unrelenting terror, I can't wait for total panic!
